== Main Inclusion Report for libhangul ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' <nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/libh/libhangul/]]</nowiki>; available for i386, amd64, sparc, powerpc
# ''Rationale:''
** Library is needed for native Korean keyboard support.
** Build dependency of nabi
 0. ''Security:''
** No security history
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** No bug reports on LP or Debian BTS
** Supposed to work out of the box, although I cannot test it, because I don't have any Korean keyboard present.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Package comes from Debian, therefor it is supposed to be compliant with Debian standards.
** Packaging system: debhelper, cdbs
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** Build-Depends: cdbs (>= 0.4.48), autotools-dev, debhelper (>= 5)
** Binary depends on libc6
** All in main

=== Reviewers ===

'''Approved''' for Ubuntu main by Ian Jackson 31.8.2007.
